name: none
detail: none

name: Silver pieces
detail: A small bag filled with Silver coins.

name: Brew of finer DMG
detail: Drink to gain +2 Dmg to your next damage roll.

name: Brew of finer STR
detail: Drink to gain +5 Str to your next d100 dice roll.

name: Brew of finer DEX
detail: Drink to gain +5 Dex to your next d100 dice roll.

name: Brew of finer INT
detail: Drink to gain +5 Int to your next d100 dice roll.

name: Objective item
detail: An “Objective item” is found that may be required for a quest (check the current quest’s details). If it’s not needed for the quest, it is instead a “Fine item” worth 100gp.

name: Brew of finer DEF
detail: Drink to gain +2 Def on a monsters next damage roll.

name: finer armour
detail: Roll on table A – Armour and add “finer” before its name, it gains +0.2 Def.

name: finer weapon
detail: Roll on table W – Weapon and add “finer” before its name, add +1 to its Dmg.

name: Silver pieces
detail: A small bag filled with Silver coins.

name: Potion of finer STR
detail: Drink to gain +5 Str until you next shade a Â on the time track.

name: Potion of finer DEX
detail: Drink to gain +5 Dex until you next shade a Â on the time track.

name: Potion of finer INT
detail: Drink to gain +5 Int until you next shade a Â on the time track.

name: Potion of finer remove poison
detail: Drink to remove up to 4 shaded pips on the poison track.

name: Potion of finer healing
detail: Drink to restore up to 8 lost HP.

name: Elixir of finer fate
detail: Drink to gain 1 fate point.

name: Scroll
detail: You find a parchment containing a spell, roll once on table S – Spells, and add “Scroll of” before the spell name before adding it to the adventure sheet.

name: Potion of finer cure disease
detail: Drink to remove up to 4 shaded pips on the disease track.

name: Silver pieces
detail: A small bag filled with Silver coins.

name: Elixir of finer STR
detail: Drink to gain 1 point of primary Str.

name: Elixir of finer DEX
detail: Drink to gain 1 point of primary Dex.

name: Elixir of finer INT
detail: Drink to gain 1 point of primary Int.

name: Elixir of finer health
detail: Drink to gain 1 point of primary HP.

name: Potion of finer fate
detail: Drink to add +40 to a result when rolling on the next table.

name: Elixir of finer life
detail: Drink to gain 1 Life point.

name: Greater treasure
detail: A much greater treasure is found, roll on table TB – Treasure B.

name: Legendary ring
detail: Roll on table L for its legend (ring slot) and value.

name: Legendary necklace
detail: Roll on table L for its legend (neck slot) and value.
